author: andschwa
body: This is an over arching task representing the switch from a custom GNUMake build system, to the .NET team's supported cross platform build system, dotnet cli.  In the process, DNX was tested as well, but dotnet cli is replacing DNX, and produces output much more favorable for us.  VSO create date - 12/17/2015 12:05:00     VSO closed date - 12/17/2015 12:07:00
title: Deprecate Makefile build system
